description: Try our easy to follow Beef & Black Bean Stir-Fry With Baby Corn recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Beef & Black Bean Stir-Fry With Baby Corn
name: Beef & Black Bean Stir-Fry With Baby Corn Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon among serving bowls topped with spring onion and bean shoots with rice to the side. Tip 1: Swap beef for chicken stir-fry strips. Tip 2: After cleaning your wok, spray with oil and wipe with paper towel to prevent wok from rusting. Tip 3: Swap the baby corn with a small can of corn kernels, drained.
